Room.Name: Nowhere Fast Traveler's Guild
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Nowhere Fast Traveler's Guild, a place where you can pick up all kinds of information about this and other cities and events.
Room.LongDescription: The large guild sells guides to just about every city and about almost anything going on in the cities. The Traveler's Guild is an essential stop for all visitors to Oceancrest, and to those planning to leave Oceancrest for other cities.
